steps.title: Contact Us
steps.description: Reach out via phone, email, or our online form. We respond within 2 hours during business days.

steps.title: Expert Care
steps.description: Our certified technicians handle your device with precision and care using quality parts.
steps.timelineContent: What you get: Real-time updates on repair progress, plus optional cleaning and performance optimization, free of charge.

steps.title: Quality Guarantee
steps.description: Every repair comes with our 90-day warranty and ongoing support for peace of mind.
steps.timelineContent: Extra benefit: Get access to our priority support line and reminders for preventive maintenance so your tech stays healthy.

TestimonialsSection.title: What Our Customers Say
TestimonialsSection.description: Real experiences from people who trust us with their technology

testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.content: Bambú saved my business when our main computer crashed right before tax season. They recovered everything and had us back up in 24 hours. Incredible service!

testimonials.name: Marcus Rodriguez
testimonials.content: I've been using Bambú for all my tech needs for over a year. Their preventive maintenance keeps my equipment running perfectly, and their prices are always fair.

testimonials.name: Emily Watson
testimonials.content: My laptop screen cracked the day before finals. Bambú fixed it the same day and even gave me a student discount. They really understand what matters to their customers.

testimonials.name: David Kim
testimonials.content: We've partnered with Bambú for our company's device maintenance. Their business solutions have saved us time and money while keeping our team productive.

testimonials.name: Lisa Thompson
testimonials.content: When my camera's memory card corrupted with a wedding shoot on it, Bambú recovered every single photo. They're not just tech experts—they're lifesavers.

testimonials.name: James Wilson
testimonials.content: I was intimidated by technology issues, but the Bambú team explained everything clearly and patiently. They made the whole process stress-free.

testimonials.name: Sophia Ramirez
testimonials.content: I signed up for an annual maintenance plan for my coffee shop, and my devices have worked perfectly since then. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Alex Cruz
testimonials.content: They helped me recover audio files I thought were lost forever. Super skilled team and very friendly support.

testimonials.name: Valentina Torres
testimonials.content: I was afraid I'd lose my renderings before a big deadline, but Bambú fixed my PC and backed everything up in less than 48 hours.

testimonials.name: Michael Lee
testimonials.content: I'm based in Canada and requested remote help to optimize my laptop. Great customer service, they solved it in one session.

testimonials.name: Ana Gomez
testimonials.content: My son broke the tablet and I thought it was gone for good. Bambú fixed it and gave us tips on how to keep it safe.

testimonials.name: Daniela Paredes
testimonials.content: Whenever something unexpected happens to my laptop, Bambú replies fast and their maintenance tips are always spot on.
